topic.title: Use tor impossible on palemoon ? Is Palemoon that Secure ?
topic.body:
Use tor impossible on palemoon ? Is Palemoon that Secure ?

https://forum.palemoon.org/viewtopic.php?f=37&t=22341
	a copy on:
https://web.archive.org/save/https://forum.palemoon.org/viewtopic.php?f=37&t=22341
https://archive.fo/sNoNj
	
	On the page
https://forum.palemoon.org/viewtopic.php?f=37&t=22321&sid=abb0c878b8073d4e24e1442f331a0dba
(Captcha Cloudeflare)

	a copy on:
https://web.archive.org/web/20190619190433/https://forum.palemoon.org/viewtopic.php?f=37&sid=abb0c878b8073d4e24e24e1442f331a0dba&t=22321
https://archive.is/ivB1R


It was asked why palemoon configured under tor (127.0.0.1:9050)
could not access addresses with a 'cloudflare service'.

Cloudflare blocks the 'exit node addresses' of 'the tor network':	
		These addresses are well known and are increasingly used as spam.
		https://raw.githubusercontent.com/firehol/blocklist-ipsets/master/firehol_level3.netset


The technical Question that Was Asked on this page was :
- Can Palemoon be considered a secure browser ? Since it is now impossible to use it with the tor service, in more and more sites, sites using the cloudflare service ?

The question remains unresolved and as long as a TECHNICAL SOLUTION IS FOUND :
- The Answer is NO, Palemoon is no longer Secure.



Examples of increasingly common and important addresses, websites that have subscribed to 'the very restrictive Cloudflare's service':

Try running tor, set palemoon for tor (127.0.0.1:9050), palemoon or any other browser.
And you will see the growing number of sites now using 'Cloudflare's restrictive service'.

Examples for technical addresses revolving 'only around palemoon':
www.palemoon.org
https://addons.palemoon.org



Which is CRAZY BUT COMPLETELY CRAZY,
IS THAT 'TECHNICAL SITES' HAVE BEEN CAUGHT 'IN THE CLOUDFLARE TRAP':

topic.title: Prefer -git packages
topic.body:
Prefer -git packages

I give a little unix advice, given the multiplication of drifts of major linux distributions over the years now.

And since the major distributions were literally squatted by small chiefs who 'made obviously very bad technical decisions' as they usually do.

It is better -to surpass their decisions-, and a good way to do it is to install git (version*) packages. and to update the package when we want on a case-by-case basis,

* It's a way of speaking git is not really a version

topic.title: "Try Cloudflare" "No Thank You"
topic.body:
"Try Cloudflare" "No Thank You"

wget -c --no-check-certificate -e http_proxy=127.0.0.1:9050 https://notabug.org/crimeflare/cloudflare-tor/archive/master.tar.gz

Extensions to block or bypass cloudflare.
Personally. question of freedom I block the pages that block me. So I prefer to redirect myself to alternative services that will provide the same services.

topic.title: The Net is so Fake.
topic.body:
The Net is so Fake.

With the ever-growing list of asshole sites, more than 5 million already. 5058137 domains using Cloudflare (1).


We can see that everything that has been imitated since the mid-1990s on the Internet, are jerky (websites).
Websites of little virgins, petty-bourgeois mawkishness.

The net before was much more interesting at the time. There was nothing in terms of technology on it, and yet the richness of the individual pages WERE OF 'ANOTHER QUALITY';
individual reflections, true sharing, sincere and 'mentally stable people'.

Since then and again the petty bourgeoisie has taken possession of this environment. Because it is bored and has 'no personal life'.
So IT PISSES OFF THOSE WHO HAVE ONE, the Same old Masonic Mentality of the pain in the ass and the profiteer.

In short, for a few years now, I've been wondering how To Filter the wheat from the chaff, and I've found it:

As usual the intellectual laziness of the petty bourgeoisie. It choses the laziest solution. The laziness that really seems to be the only true standard of the freemasonry.
And chose the Clouflare service.

Now I can recognize all these shit sites 
... and with these extensions (2) for firefox and chrome, BLOCK THESE MOTHER 'FUCKER SITES'.


(1)
https://notabug.org/crimeflare/cloudflare-tor/src/master/cloudflare_users/domains
		https://web.archive.org/web/20190623144049/https://notabug.org/crimeflare/cloudflare-tor/src/master/cloudflare_users/domains
http://www.crimeflare.org:82/cfs.html
		https://web.archive.org/web/20181111184611/http://www.crimeflare.org:82/cfs.html

(2) Extensions to block Cloudflare.
wget -c --no-check-certificate -e http_proxy=127.0.0.1:9050 https://notabug.org/crimeflare/cloudflare-tor/archive/master.tar.gz


The Freemason is a piece of shit whose only purpose is to end up hanged from a rope.

1558459108_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body:
Democracy does not exist, 'the people' just do not exist.
It is time for people to understand the form of government in which they live.

As for the decentralization of the Internet, it will end up as bit torrent, a wonderful tool that is only used to exchange entertainment.

I have said it a 'thousand times', you are tired of your government, find leaders and protect them.
After they will do the work.
In history, it has never been any other way, and it has always ended in a bloodbath; that's the price to pay.

Otherwise you can just forget what I just said, and change the Tv channel.

> [sunburned](#comment_3_1EgzWjmHScPyRx64GHH2bNXpGsbbshKjPA): Just in case someone else thinks this will route your traffic through Tor, it won't Tor doesn't support HTTP proxies. Wget should fail but it doesn't it just continues to download through your own network connection.

install torsocks and create a bash with:

#!/bin/sh
unset http_proxy
unset HTTP_PROXY
unset https_proxy
unset HTTPS_PROXY

exec torsocks /usr/bin/wget --passive-ftp "$@"

> [anonymouslogin](#comment_6_17AMQVbBa12XB3xFWKDnP2dCEx92TaiY7X): It should be more helpful if one explain in detail why cloudflare is bad, e.g. making the internet centralized.

For the same reason you are here. Because you're looking for free speech. Why free speech? Because it is decentralized, so the word can't be controled.
Cloudflare is bad because, it is an intermediary, One more on the long term that already exists on the Internet, and that makes the Internet dead. And that it will not rise from its ashes like the phoenix. 
That's why I work hard with others to make it clear that people who try to revive something that's dead have morribund behaviour. They behave morribly because they are always under the spell of this highly controlled society on all kinds of aspects that the quidam has no idea of.
Long enough answer?

PS:
It would also be nice if people could do their own education themselves. Instead of asking people like me. It would avoid me repeating myself for decades. Or having to write this on tablets that eventually become the sacred texts, that emerged here and there for all civilizations. Thanks. I also try to have a normal life but spend too much in it helping psychologically deficient people.
